attributes.action: To reconsider who needs to work scheme in the UK escapailly the DWP and JBC
attributes.additional_details: To me this means alot I'm a young person who has been looking for part time work for 2 year and can not find nothing because for various different reasons. In terms of Job Center and DWP I can write a two page letter of what I think of them and why I think that about them and keep doing everything I can to stop the DWP and Job center for their treatment to my mother.
attributes.background: This is important because the elderly who can barley move properly are asked so much from DWP and Job Center and are forced to do so with very little choice and the people have very little empathy in other people scenarios. It will also give the younger generation more chances of work.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
